author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Cleanup of BeamSpot DQM clients code: 
the option `transDelay` (implemented in [this line](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/CondCore/DBOutputService/src/PoolDBOutputService.cc#L48) of `CondCore`) was originally implemented so that DB experts (@ggovi) could debug more easily the new BeamSpot Online workflow and represents the delay in seconds for the commit of the db transaction. 
This option should not be used in production (and indeed it was already set to 0 by default and never changed) so it is now removed from the clients in order to avoid possible future errors.

#### PR validation:
Code compiles and `scramv1 b runtests` runs fine.

#### Backport
Not a backport, no backport needed
title: Remove unused `transDelay` option from BeamSpot DQM clients
